question: Which three countries share the location of the mountain range "Nimba Range"?
explanation: Liberia, Guinea, Ivory Coast are the three countries that share the location of the mountain range "Nimba Range". The Nimba Range forms part of the southern extent of the Guinea Highlands. The highest peak is Mount Richard-Molard on the border of CÃ´te d'Ivoire and Guinea, at 1,752 m. Mount Nimba Strict Nature Reserve of Guinea and Ivory Coast covers significant portions of the Nimba Range.
